com.datumbox.framework.machinelearning.common.bases.mlmodels

Class BaseMLclusterer.Cluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datumbox.framework.machinelearning.common.bases.mlmodels.BaseMLclusterer.Cluster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Learnable, Serializable, Iterable<Integer>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseDPMM.Cluster, HierarchicalAgglomerative.Cluster, Kmeans.Cluster
    Enclosing class:
    BaseMLclusterer<CL extends BaseMLclusterer.Cluster,MP extends BaseMLclusterer.ModelParameters,TP extends BaseMLclusterer.TrainingParameters,VM extends BaseMLclusterer.ValidationMetrics>

    public abstract static class BaseMLclusterer.Cluster
extends Object
implements Learnable, Iterable<Integer>
    The Cluster class stores all the information of the cluster, including the assigned points, the parameters and the label.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Integer clusterId
      The id of the cluster.
      protected Object labelY
      The Y label of the cluster is the "gold standard class" (if available).
      protected Set<Integer> recordIdSet
      The set which contains the id of the records included in the cluster.
